price: 29. Nanu ni Rabbi kaah yaguude saytunnoysiyyah kaa saytunnosna, diggah nanu ninni nafsi yudlume marah sugne tumaleela cakkik waasneemil.
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥāna rabbinā innā kunnā ẓālimīna
